sentence.Network_en: There are additional publications of special relevance to new graduates.
sentence.Network_cn: 还有对于新毕业生来说特别重要的其他出版物。

sentence.Network_en: Her ideas have lost all relevance to the modern world.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的想法与现代社会完全脱节.

sentence.Network_en: He claims that the laws are antiquated and have no contemporary relevance.
sentence.Network_cn: 他声称这些法规过于陈旧,已没有任何现实意义.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...环境里的事实做到相互明白是认识的目的的话，是什么使得这种目的得以实现呢？关联理论提出了关联(relevance)和明示(ostension) …
有关联性(Relevance)、原创性(Originality)、震撼性(Impact)，广告创意的第一步是要找准记忆点。
精准相关度(Relevance)：由于Facebook的社交场景强化实名社交，大部分用户的资料真实可信，也更容易让社交广告有一个精准定向 …
其二，适切（Relevance）所指涉的是：学生能否察觉到教学能实现其目标，或是满足其需求。其三，信心（Confidence）所指涉的 …

list.abs: 关联理论（relevance theory）是由语言学家Sperber 和Wilson在《关联：交际与认知》（Relevance：Communication & Cognition） …
isuses什么意思_百度知道 ... issues: 争点|隔阂|议题 Relevant issues: 相关问题|相干问题|相关疑难 rights issues: 权利股发行.
成考学位英语高... ... 578. inwith relation to 关于， 有关 579. relevant to 与…有关的 580. to one's relief 令…感到放心的是.
财务英语英汉对照表 (R) - MBA智库百科 ... relevance principle 相关性原则 relevant cost 相关成本 relevant range 相关范围.

entry.def: Something's relevance to a situation or person is its importance or significance in that situation or to that person.

example.ex: Politicians' private lives have no relevance to their public roles...
example.tran: 政治家的私生活与他们的公众角色不相关。

example.ex: There are additional publications of special relevance to new graduates.
example.tran: 还有对于新毕业生来说特别重要的其他出版物。

means.word_mean: 1. the relation of something to the matter at hand

auth_sentence.content: Now you're backpedaling on the relevance of sightings.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now you're backpedaling on the relevance of sightings.

sentences.en: She did not understand the relevance of his remarks.
sentences.cn: 她不理解他的议论与话题有何相干。

sentences.en: I can’t see the relevance of his comment to the debate.
sentences.cn: 我不明白他的评论与这一争论有何关系。

sentences.en: Her ideas have lost all relevance to the modern world.
sentences.cn: 她的想法与现代社会完全脱节。

sentences.en: He claims that the laws are antiquated and have no contemporary relevance.
sentences.cn: 他声称这些法规过于陈旧，已没有任何现实意义。
